title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for stating moving to the right with reason

1 point is earned for considering dy/dt dx/dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@

1 point is earned for slope at t = 2

dx dt | t=2 = 2 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41F9@

Because dx dt | t=2 >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4016@ , the particle is moving to the right at time t = 2.

dy dx | t=2 = dy/dt | t=2 dx/dt | t=2 =3.055 (or 3.054) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5E2F@
descriptions:
